                  # VuePress

                  VuePress æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªä»¥ Markdown ä¸ºä¸­å¿ƒçš„é™æ€ç½‘ç«™ç”Ÿæˆå™¨ã€‚

                  # å¿«é€Ÿå¼€å§‹

                  1ã€åˆ›å»ºå¹¶è¿›å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°ç›®å½•

                  mkdir vuepress-starter && cd vuepress-starter

                  2ã€ä½¿ç”¨ä½ å–œæ¬¢çš„åŒ…ç®¡ç†å™¨è¿›è¡Œåˆå§‹åŒ–

                  yarn init # npm init

                  3ã€å°† VuePress å®‰è£…ä¸ºæœ¬åœ°ä¾èµ–

                  yarn add -D vuepress # npm install -D vuepress

                  4ã€åˆ›å»ºç¬¬ä¸€ç¯‡æ–‡æ¡£

                  mkdir docs && echo '# Hello VuePress' > docs/README.md

                  5ã€åœ¨ package.json ä¸­æ·»åŠ ä¸€äº› scripts(opens new window)open in new window

                  {
  "scripts": {
    "docs:dev": "vuepress dev docs",
    "docs:build": "vuepress build docs"

                  æœ€ç»ˆpackage.jsonå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                  {
    "name": "blog",
    "version": "1.0.0",
    "description": "å¼€å‘æŠ€æœ¯ï¼Œåˆ†å¸ƒå¼ï¼Œå¾®æœåŠ¡ï¼Œé«˜å¹¶å‘ï¼Œé«˜å¯ç”¨ï¼Œé«˜å¯æ‰©å±•ï¼Œé«˜å¯ç»´æŠ¤ï¼ŒJVMæŠ€æœ¯ï¼ŒMySQLï¼Œåˆ†å¸ƒå¼æ•°æ®åº“ï¼Œåˆ†å¸ƒå¼äº‹åŠ¡ï¼Œäº‘åŸç”Ÿï¼Œå¤§æ•°æ®ï¼Œäº‘è®¡ç®—ï¼Œæ¸—é€æŠ€æœ¯ï¼Œå„ç§é¢è¯•é¢˜ï¼Œé¢è¯•æŠ€å·§",
    "main": "index.js",
    "keywords": [
        "å¼€å‘æŠ€æœ¯ï¼Œåˆ†å¸ƒå¼ï¼Œå¾®æœåŠ¡ï¼Œé«˜å¹¶å‘ï¼Œé«˜å¯ç”¨ï¼Œé«˜å¯æ‰©å±•ï¼Œé«˜å¯ç»´æŠ¤ï¼ŒJVMæŠ€æœ¯ï¼ŒMySQLï¼Œåˆ†å¸ƒå¼æ•°æ®åº“ï¼Œåˆ†å¸ƒå¼äº‹åŠ¡ï¼Œäº‘åŸç”Ÿï¼Œå¤§æ•°æ®ï¼Œäº‘è®¡ç®—ï¼Œæ¸—é€æŠ€æœ¯ï¼Œå„ç§é¢è¯•é¢˜ï¼Œé¢è¯•æŠ€å·§"

                  6ã€åœ¨docsç›®å½•ä¸‹æ–°å»ºç›®å½•kafkaï¼Œæ–°å»ºmdæ–‡ä»¶

                  æ³¨æ„ï¼šä¸€å®šè¦åŒ…å«README.mdæ–‡ä»¶

                  7ã€åœ¨æœ¬åœ°å¯åŠ¨æœåŠ¡å™¨

                  yarn docs:dev # npm run docs:dev

                  VuePress ä¼šåœ¨ http://localhost:8080 (opens new window)open in new windowå¯åŠ¨ä¸€ä¸ªçƒ­é‡è½½çš„å¼€å‘æœåŠ¡å™¨ã€‚

                  # é…ç½®å¯¼èˆªæ 

                  # é¡¶éƒ¨å¯¼èˆªæ 

                  é€šè¿‡ themeConfig.nav å¢åŠ ä¸€äº›å¯¼èˆªæ é“¾æ¥

                  // .vuepress/config.js
module.exports = {
  title: '',
  description: 'å¼€å‘æŠ€æœ¯ï¼Œåˆ†å¸ƒå¼ï¼Œå¾®æœåŠ¡ï¼Œé«˜å¹¶å‘ï¼Œé«˜å¯ç”¨ï¼Œé«˜å¯æ‰©å±•ï¼Œé«˜å¯ç»´æŠ¤ï¼ŒJVMæŠ€æœ¯ï¼ŒMySQLï¼Œåˆ†å¸ƒå¼æ•°æ®åº“ï¼Œåˆ†å¸ƒå¼äº‹åŠ¡ï¼Œäº‘åŸç”Ÿï¼Œå¤§æ•°æ®ï¼Œäº‘è®¡ç®—ï¼Œæ¸—é€æŠ€æœ¯ï¼Œå„ç§é¢è¯•é¢˜ï¼Œé¢è¯•æŠ€å·§',
  markdown:{
	  pageSuffix: '.md',
  },
  themeConfig: {
	   displayAllHeaders: true ,
	   activeHeaderLinks: false,
	   smoothScroll: true,
	   sidebarDepth: 2,
       nav: [
            { text: 'é¦–é¡µ', link: '/' },
            { 
                text: 'æ¶ˆæ¯ä¸­é—´ä»¶', 
                items: [
                    { text: 'kafka', link: '/kafka/' }
                ]
            }
        ],
	    sidebar: {
			 '/kafka/': genSidebar.genDefaultSidebar('kafka', 'kafka', true, 4),
			 '/': ['']
	
		}
  }

}

                  # ä¾§è¾¹å¯¼èˆªæ 

                  é€šè¿‡é…ç½® themeConfig.sidebar ä¾§è¾¹å¯¼èˆªç”Ÿæ•ˆ

                  é€šå¸¸æ–‡æ¡£å¤šçš„æ—¶å€™æ‰‹åŠ¨é…ç½®ä¾§è¾¹æ éå¸¸éº»çƒ¦ï¼Œå› æ­¤è¿™é‡Œé‡‡ç”¨äº†è„šæœ¬è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆï¼Œå…¶åŸç†å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                  1ã€éå†æŒ‡å®šè·¯å¾„ä¸­çš„Markdownæ–‡æ¡£ï¼Œå¹¶è¿‡æ»¤æ‰æ— å…³æ–‡æ¡£ï¼› 2ã€é€šè¿‡ç¬¦å·â€œ.â€åˆ‡å‰²æ–‡ä»¶åè·å–åºå·ï¼Œæ ¹æ®æ–‡æ¡£åºå·è¿›è¡Œæ’åºï¼› 3ã€æŠ½å–æ–‡æ¡£åç§°ä½œä¸ºä¾§è¾¹æ æ ‡é¢˜ï¼ˆtitleï¼‰ï¼Œå¹¶æ‹¼æ¥å‡ºæ–‡æ¡£è·¯å¾„ï¼ˆpathï¼‰

                  // docs/.vuepress/utils/genSidebar.js
// docs/.vuepress/utils/genSidebar.js
const fs = require('fs');
const rpath = require('path');

// è·å–æ ¹ç›®å½•
var DOCS_PATH = rpath.resolve(__dirname, '../..');

// æ¯”è¾ƒæ–‡æ¡£åºåˆ—
function cmpMarkDown(md1, md2) {
    var ls1 = md1.split('.');
    var ls2 = md2.split('.');
    return parseInt(ls1[0]) - parseInt(ls2[0]);
}

// è·å–mdæ–‡æ¡£åˆ—è¡¨
function getMarkDownList(path, is_sort) {
    var list = new Array();
    if (typeof path == "string" && typeof is_sort == "boolean") {
        let file_list = fs.readdirSync(path);
        for (let i = 0; i < file_list.length; i++) {
            let file = file_list[i];
            if (file.endsWith('.md') && file.indexOf('README') == -1) {
                list.push(file);
            }
        }
        if (is_sort) {
            list.sort(cmpMarkDown)
        }
    }
    return list;
}

// è£å‰ªåˆ°æ–‡æœ¬å·¦ä¾§çš„ç‰¹æ®Šå­—ç¬¦
function trimRight(string) {
    var str = new String();
    if (typeof string == "string") {
        str = string
        var filter = new String(' \t\r\n');
        if (filter.indexOf(str.charAt(str.length - 1) != -1)) {
            var i = str.length - 1;
            while (i >= 0 && filter.indexOf(str.charAt(i)) != -1) {
                i--;
            }
            str = str.substring(0, i + 1);
        }
        return str;
    }
    return undefined;
}

var genSidebar = {
    // ç”Ÿæˆä¾§è¾¹æ 
    genDefaultSidebar: function (path, name, is_sort, depth) {
        var result = new Array();
        var object = new Object();
        if (typeof path == "string" && typeof name == "string") {
            let target_path = rpath.resolve(DOCS_PATH, path);
            if (typeof depth != "number") {
                depth = 2;
            }
            object.title = name;
            object.collapsable = false;
            object.sidebarDepth = depth;
            object.children = new Array();

            let md_list = getMarkDownList(target_path, is_sort);
            for (let i = 0; i < md_list.length; i++) {
                let md = md_list[i];
                let ls = md.split('.');
                let iter = new Object();
                if (ls.length > 2) {
                    iter.title = ls[1];
                    iter.path = ls[0] + '.' + ls[1];
                } else {
                    iter.title = ls[0];
                    iter.path = ls[0];
                }
                object.children.push(iter);
            }
        }
        result.push(object);
        return result;
    }
}

module.exports = genSidebar;

                  é¢„è§ˆæ•ˆæœå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                  # éƒ¨ç½²

                  éƒ¨ç½²åˆ° GitHub Pages

                  1ã€åœ¨docs/.vuepress/config.js ä¸­è®¾ç½®æ­£ç¡®çš„ baseã€‚

                  å¦‚æœæ‰“ç®—å‘å¸ƒåˆ° https://<USERNAME>.github.io/ï¼Œåˆ™å¯ä»¥çœç•¥è¿™ä¸€æ­¥ï¼Œå› ä¸º base é»˜è®¤å³æ˜¯ "/"ã€‚

                  å¦‚æœæ‰“ç®—å‘å¸ƒåˆ° https://<USERNAME>.github.io/<REPO>/ï¼ˆä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´ä½ çš„ä»“åº“åœ¨ https://github.com/<USERNAME>/<REPO>ï¼‰ï¼Œåˆ™å°† base è®¾ç½®ä¸º "/<REPO>/"ã€‚

                  2ã€åœ¨GitHubä¸Šå»ºç«‹ä»“åº“ï¼Œå¹¶å»ºç«‹åˆ†æ”¯gh-pages

                  3ã€å‘å¸ƒ

                  # ç”Ÿæˆé™æ€æ–‡ä»¶
npm run docs:build

# è¿›å…¥ç”Ÿæˆçš„æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹
cd docs/.vuepress/dist
git add .
git commit -m 'deploy'

# å¦‚æœå‘å¸ƒåˆ° https://<USERNAME>.github.io
# git push -f git@github.com:<USERNAME>/<USERNAME>.github.io.git master

# å¦‚æœå‘å¸ƒåˆ° https://<USERNAME>.github.io/<REPO>
# git push -f git@github.com:<USERNAME>/<REPO>.git master:gh-pages
                  ä¸Šæ¬¡ç¼–è¾‘äº:
                  è´¡çŒ®è€…: javacode
